Entries.CommunityCenter: Ah, good morning @! I keep the fridge well-stocked with leftovers.#$b#I wouldn't want anyone in this town to go hungry.
Good afternoon, my friend. Ah yes, as much as I enjoy nature's shower, a hot meal and a sturdy roof do wonders in restoring the spirit.$1
